metadata.name: Vidhin's Regexes - Basic
metadata.description:
Essential sorting for Anime, Movies, and TV Shows using regex patterns from [TRaSH Guides](https://trash-guides.info). Features Ranked Stream Expressions with intelligent scoring for release groups, quality filtering, and repack detection. 

 * **â“˜ Requires Stream Expression Score in your sort order** (remove Regex Patterns and ranked regex scores) 
 * Add `{stream.seScore}` to formatter to display scores and `{stream.rseMatched}` to display the matched stream expressions  
 * Filters out low-quality releases, unwanted formats, and problematic groups 
 * **Recommended only for public instances with stricter limits**  
 * **Note for public instance admins:** Set `MAX_STREAM_EXPRESSION_FILTERS=100`+ as Basic template will be discontinued in favor of advanced template, and future updates will add more expressions
metadata.author: Vidhin05

rankedStreamExpressions.expression: /*Remux T1*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Remux T1') : []
/*Remux T2*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Remux T2') : []
/*Remux T3*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Remux T3') : []
/*Bluray T1*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Bluray T1') : []
/*Bluray T2*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Bluray T2') : []
/*Bluray T3*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Bluray T3') : []
/*Web T1*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Web T1') : []
/*Web T2*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Web T2') : []
/*Web T3*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams,'Web T3') : []
/*#SeaDex Best*/ isAnime ? seadex(streams, 'best') : []
/*#SeaDex Alt*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams, 'best'), seadex(streams)) : []
/*Anime BD T1*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T1')) : []
/*Anime BD T2*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T2')) : []
/*Anime BD T3*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T3')) : []
/*Anime BD T4*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T4')) : []
/*Anime BD T5*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T5')) : []
/*Remux T1 (Anime)*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Remux T1')) : []
/*Remux T2 (Anime)*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Remux T2')) : []
/*Remux T3 (Anime)*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Remux T3')) : []
/*Anime BD T6*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T6')) : []
/*Anime BD T7*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T7')) : []
/*Anime BD T8*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime BD T8')) : []
/*Anime Web T1*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime Web T1')) : []
/*Anime Web T2*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime Web T2')) : []
/*Anime Web T3*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime Web T3')) : []
/*Anime Web T4*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime Web T4')) : []
/*Anime Web T5*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime Web T5')) : []
/*Anime Web T6*/ isAnime ? negate(seadex(streams), regexMatched(streams,'Anime Web T6')) : []
/*Repack*/ (queryType == 'movie' or queryType == 'series') ? regexMatched(streams, 'Repack/Proper','Repack2','Repack3') : []

/*Bad*/ regexMatched(streams, '3D', 'Anime LQ Groups', 'Anime Raws', 'AV1', 'Bad Dual Groups', 'Dubs Only', 'Extras', 'VOSTFR', 'Generated Dynamic HDR', 'LQ', 'LQ (Release Title)', 'Sing-Along Versions')
